name: This is not a Build prototype
name_original: This is not a Build prototype
description:
An experimental card game, inspired by chess, memory, and dungeon crawler games.

It's a demo/prototype.

Made under 8 weeks for a course at Uppsala University in Game Design. Everything except the sound effects is self-made. Songs and sound effects are credited in the 'Credits' scene.

Team:

  • Faruk Osmanagaoglu - Product Owner/Game Design & Programming
  • Aleksandr Poliakov -  Game Design & Testing
  • Marcus Landley - Sound Design & Testing
  • To Nhi Hoang - Programming
  • Arushi David Audimulapu - Art
  • Shilong Qi - Art
